title: Diana or Malzahar
body:
Hi!
This is my first forum post on, well, anything, so I'm probably gonna look like a rookie, but I need some help.
I'm a Midlane Akali {{champion:84}} and Taliyah {{champion:163}} main, and don't get me wrong, they're the champions I have the most fun on, but I want something new, especially since I'm going into ranked soon. After I get Ahri {{champion:103}} I'm stuck between getting Malzahar {{champion:90}} or Diana {{champion:131}}. Seeing as neither are free to play right now, I was hoping some of you would help give me insight.
Thanks!

replies.body:
Hiya ElementalZyrus !

Ranked for the first time hmm how are you feeling?

I remember being so scared, but I'm sure you're gonna do awesome!

Honestly, if you wanna tilt someone pick malzahar :)

He;s pretty easy to pick up and has an annoying spell shield as HIS PASSIVE!

All you do is spam those space creatures and buy rylais and liandries BOOM get that Penta kill :D

I'm pretty nervous, but as I stated, I'm still a little while of starting my ranked experience. Thanks for asking though.
It's looking like Malzahar is gonna be the choice here, or at least many people seem to think it's best

> [{quoted}](name=ElementalZyrus,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=Q6RH6L9f,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2017-09-13T06:42:51.266+0000)
>
> I'm pretty nervous, but as I stated, I'm still a little while of starting my ranked experience. Thanks for asking though.
> It's looking like Malzahar is gonna be the choice here, or at least many people seem to think it's best

Go well! I'll hopefully see you on the rift :D

It's totally normal being nervous for your first few ranked games, so don't worry too much and have fun!! :)

Pretty easy to blow someone up on malz. Learn the kit mechanics and youll be fine.. 
Practice landing your q on someone effected by e, get this combo down and you can harass the shit out of someone in lane
If you're still buying champions it's too soon for you to jump onto Ranked. You will sandbag a bunch of innocent players' games until you finally hit Bronze V.

I am aware of the B5 hell, and I'm not planning on going into ranked for a little while yet, I assure you, I still have plenty to learn. I asked simply because I was unsure about which would best suit my playstyle

what this guys says.

b5 is a terrible place.

Depends what you want then for. Diana is a mobile burst assassin where as Malz is a control Mage that pushes well and has a good ult for locking down a member of the enemy team. 

As for ranked. Make sure you have champs in the other roles as you may get autofilled. So have at least two champs in each role and have a general idea to play them. Maybe more for your off role. What were you going to  select as your off role?

My off role is Jungle, and I have a general idea of how each lane works, as I often auto-fill when I'm playing solo queue as it is. I also have at least two champions in each role that I know how to play well enough

Diana snowballs better when fed, so if you aren't top tier in your current level then I would just stick with Malzahar cuz even if you feed on him you can just press r on the adc in a teamfight and you've done your job.
